title: Reporting
body: Riot, I have an idea could you please make it available all  chat logs after the game of both teams and give us time to review what was toxic to report the abusive players more efficiently.

replies.body: No. If it didn't see it, you don't need to report. You don't need to report because someone told you to report.
If you dont know if you need to report someone, you dont need to report someone.
